response_parsed.title: Type-Checking Web Backends with FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates how to leverage FastAPI, a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+, to implement type checking for backend applications.
key_points: FastAPI supports automatic JSON serialization and deserialization
Supports Pydantic models for data validation
Integrates with popular databases, like SQLAlchemy and ORM
Has an intuitive router system to organize APIs
caveats: Ensure that the FastAPI package is installed with `pip install fastapi`.
Replace the `check_database_connection()` function with your database connection check logic.
